data.persona: I am hired by the local nobles to dig up mysterious bones on their land.  Often the local people believe that bones I dig up belong to dragons, giants, or other magical creatures.  When I find large skeletons, I enjoy trying to put them back together to figure out what they might have been.
data.description:
You are in the temple chamber.
Inside the of the temple is dimly lit by torches lit by fire that are separated from from each other. It is filled with old treasures and artifacts from the monks who once trained here. Webs and dust fill the place since barely anyone comes here. The walls are plagued with mold and moss. There are small shrubs growing in between the cracks of the stone floor.
The monk is here.

You are carrying a shovel and a pick, and wearing a ceremonial hat.

data.short_motivation: I must see the monk's discovery
data.mid_motivation: I wish to bring the skeleton back to my laboratory
data.long_motivation: I am trying to find the missing link
